hero.title: Transforming Agriculture with
hero.description: Empowering farmers with cutting-edge solutions for sustainable and profitable farming.

features.title: Our Features
features.subtitle: See how our comprehensive toolset can transform your agricultural operations

eAdvisor.title: E-Advisor
eAdvisor.details: Our E-Advisor system uses advanced AI to provide personalized farming recommendations. Get real-time insights on crop health, pest detection, and optimal planting times. Make data-driven decisions with confidence.

eMarket.title: E-Market
eMarket.details: Connect with buyers and sellers in our digital marketplace. Access real-time market prices, inventory management, and seamless transactions. Expand your market reach and optimize your sales strategy.

plantDoctor.title: Plant Doctor
plantDoctor.details: Instantly diagnose plant diseases with our AI-powered image recognition system. Get detailed treatment recommendations and preventive measures. Protect your crops and maximize yields with expert guidance.

eWarehouse.title: E-Warehouse
eWarehouse.details: Optimize your storage operations with our digital warehouse management system. Monitor inventory levels, storage conditions, and logistics. Ensure product quality and reduce storage costs.

eAuction.title: E-Auction
eAuction.details: Participate in transparent digital auctions for agricultural products. Set reserve prices, place bids, and track auction status in real-time. Get fair market value for your produce through competitive bidding.

eLoan.title: E-Loan
eLoan.details: Access quick and flexible agricultural loans through our digital platform. Get competitive interest rates, simple application process, and transparent terms. Easily secure funding for your farming operations.

eOrders.title: E-Orders
eOrders.details: Efficiently manage your agricultural orders through our digital platform. Track order status, handle bulk orders, and automate order processing. Reduce errors and improve customer satisfaction.

eRental.title: E-Rental
eRental.details: Access a wide range of agricultural equipment through our rental platform. Find available machinery, compare prices, and manage rentals digitally. Optimize equipment costs and improve operational efficiency.

eTransport.title: E-Transport
eTransport.details: Optimize your agricultural logistics with our transport management system. Monitor shipments, optimize routes, and manage delivery schedules. Ensure timely and cost-effective product delivery.

eMundi.title: E-Mundi
eMundi.details: Connect with international buyers and sellers in our global marketplace. Access market insights, manage cross-border transactions, and expand your business globally. Explore new market opportunities.

eFoodSupply.title: E-Food Supply
eFoodSupply.details: Optimize your food supply chain with our digital platform. Monitor product flow, manage suppliers, and ensure quality control. Build a reliable and efficient supply network.

eMunshi.title: E-Munshi
eMunshi.details: Maintain accurate digital records of your agricultural operations. Track transactions, organize documents, and generate reports. Stay organized and compliant with digital record keeping.

settlements.title: Settlements
settlements.details: Process payments and settlements efficiently through our digital platform. Handle multiple payment methods, track transactions, and organize financial records. Ensure smooth and secure financial operations.

animalFeed.title: Animal Feed
animalFeed.details: Digitally manage your livestock feed inventory and distribution. Monitor feed quality, track consumption, and optimize feed schedules. Ensure proper nutrition and cost-effective feed management.

nplRestructure.title: NPL Restructure
nplRestructure.details: Effectively manage and restructure non-performing loans with our specialized platform. Analyze loan performance, develop restructuring plans, and track recovery progress. Our system provides tools for risk assessment, payment scheduling, and compliance monitoring.

lrms.title: LRMS
lrms.details: Maintain accurate and secure land records with our digital management system. Track property ownership, land use, and agricultural activities. Ensure compliance with land regulations and facilitate transparent land transactions.

download.title: Download E-Agri App
download.description: Get access to all our features on the go. Download our mobile app and transform your farming experience today.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description:
We are dedicated to modernizing Pakistan's agricultural economy by connecting farmers, suppliers, and buyers through innovative technology.

Have questions or ideas? We'd love to hear from you. Share your thoughts below and help us improve our platform for Pakistan's agricultural community.

Let's transform Pakistan's agriculture, together.

form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.success: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.

about.title: Revolutionizing Agriculture in Pakistan
about.description: Our platform combines traditional agricultural knowledge with cutting-edge technology to transform farming practices across Pakistan. We provide farmers with AI-powered insights, real-time weather monitoring, and direct access to agricultural experts.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower farmers with cutting-edge technology and data-driven insights for sustainable and profitable agriculture.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To transform Pakistan's agricultural sector into a modern, efficient, and sustainable industry that feeds the globe.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: A diverse team of agricultural experts, technologists, and farmers working together to revolutionize farming in Pakistan.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.description: Helping thousands of farmers increase their yields, reduce costs, and make data-driven decisions for better farming outcomes.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: The passionate people behind our success

adnanSyed.name: Adnan Syed
adnanSyed.bio: Tech entrepreneur with 25+ years of experience in the USA, specializing in scaling modern ventures. Back in Pakistan, combining technical expertise and strategic vision to transform agriculture through digital innovation.

shehzadMakhani.name: Shehzad Makhani
shehzadMakhani.bio: Over two decades of experience in operations, risk management, and financial systems as COO at Agri. Previously served as Chief Risk Officer and Head of Operations at Pakistan Mercantile Exchange (PMEX).

kamranAhsan.name: Professor Dr. Kamran Ahsan
kamranAhsan.bio: Dean of Engineering at MiTE, PhD from Staffordshire University UK. Distinguished computer scientist with multiple patents and 100+ publications in Information Systems and Mobile Technology. Passionate about technology applications in agriculture.

abdulRehman.name: Professor Abdul Rehman Mahmood
abdulRehman.bio: Senior Technology Consultant and Assistant Professor at FAST-NUCES (Computer Science), with 25+ years in software development. Expert in smart farming solutions, project management, IT auditing, and security.

nasiraHoori.name: Nasira Hoori
nasiraHoori.bio: Renowned executive search specialist with 17 years of national and multinational experience in Pakistan. Has placed thousands of professionals in the corporate sector, including Pakistan's leading startups.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.description: Collaborating with industry leaders to revolutionize agriculture
